semantic-notifications-desc: Notifies users about changes to structured data
echo-pref-tooltip-smw-value-change: Notify me when a change to a selected entity (property, category) value in Semantic MediaWiki occurs.
echo-pref-tooltip-smw-specification-chan: Notify me about changes to entity (property, category) specifications in Semantic MediaWiki.
notification-bundle-header-smw-value-cha: $3 and {{PLURAL:$4|one other page|$4 other pages|100=99+ other pages}} had {{PLURAL:$5|a modification|some modifications}}.
notification-bundle-header-smw-specifica: $3 and {{PLURAL:$4|one other page|$4 other pages|100=99+ other pages}} had {{PLURAL:$5|a modification|some modifications}}.
smw-pa-property-predefined__notification: "$1" is a predefined property to specify a property to be watched for changes and is provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Semantic_Notifications Semantic Notifications] extension.
smw-pa-property-predefined-long__notific: A "+" value assignment indicates that any value change is being monitored while a distinct value will only cause a change to this value to create a notification event.
smw-pa-property-predefined__notification: "$1" is a predefined property that defines an arbitrary group and is provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Semantic_Notifications Semantic Notifications] extension.
smw-pa-property-predefined-long__notific: Values assigned to this property are going to be matched against the [[Property:Notifications group member of|Notifications group member of]] property to find possible users in case of a notification event.
smw-pa-property-predefined__notification: "$1" is a predefined property that declares a membership to a group and is provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Semantic_Notifications Semantic Notifications] extension.
smw-pa-property-predefined-long__notific: The group corresponds to values specified by the [[Property:Notifications to group|Notifications to group]] property.
smw-notifications-datavalue-restricted-t: Value assignments to the [[Property:Notifications group member of|Notifications group member of]] property is restricted to the User namespace.
smw-notifications-datavalue-invalid-grou: The "$1" group has not been registered (i.e. is not matchable to any [[Property:Notifications to group|Notifications to group]]).
